item.title: The State of Digital in Germany (Pt. III): Agencies & campaigns
item.description:
The State of Digital in Germany (Pt. III): Agencies & campaigns

In this last chapter about the digital world in Germany in 2016 I donâ€™t want to talk about award-winning agencies (like Grabarz & Partner) or engaging ads (like Jung von Matt for Edeka), but about the struggle both agencies and their clients face in the digital sphere and how to create truly digital campaigns worth their name.
